title: Italy vs Spain live stream: how to watch Nations League semi-final online from anywhere
author: kevin-lynch
summary: Re-run of the classic Euro 2020 semi-final
article: Luis Enrique's men will be seeking revenge for their Euro 2020 semi-final defeat as Spain head to Milan to face Italy in this intriguing UEFA Nations League last-four clash. Read on to find out how to watch Italy vs Spain online and get a Nations League live stream, no matter where you are in the world right now.
That last meeting between these two teams ended with Italy triumphing via a penalty shootout after the two sides played out a remarkable 1-1 draw at Wembley.

Injuries are set to mean its a much-changed Spanish line-up this time out, with big name stars with the likes of Pedri, Alvaro Morata, Jordi Alba, Gerard Moreno and Dani Olmo all unavailable to Enrique.
Both Ciro Immobile and Andrea Belotti miss this game for the hosts, with Giacomo Raspadori and former Everton star Moise Kean both in line to start for Roberto Mancini's European champs.
Follow our guide to get an Italy vs Spain live stream and watch the UEFA Nations League online from anywhere this weekend.

If you're abroad right now and struggling to tap into your local coverage of the game, you'll want a VPN. This'll help you circumvent the geo-blocking that will try to stop you watching an Italy vs Spain live stream in particular parts of the world.
They're a useful means of getting around this issue, are cheap, and easy to set-up as well.
